# 求解方程式

* https://ccckmit.gitbooks.io/rlab/content/solveEquation.html
* [用十分鐘搞懂 《電腦如何解方程式》 (Slideshare)](https://www.slideshare.net/ccckmit/ss-65570387)

## f1.js

```
$ node f1.js
f(3)=18
```

## f2.js

```
$ node f2.js
f(2,3)= 7.604846812909844
```

## bruteForce.js

```
$ node .\bruteForce.js
x= 0.268000000113438  f(x)= -0.00017600039294918268
x= 3.7320000001131377  f(x)= -0.00017599960809100423
```

## binarySearch.js

```
$ node .\binarySearch.js
x= 0.2679481506347656  f(x)= 0.0000036088895285502076
```

## hillClimbing.js

```
$ node .\hillClimbing.js
x= 0.2700000000000001 f(x)= -0.007100000000000328
```

## iteration

```
$ node .\iteration.js
x= 1
x= 1.5
x= 2.1875
x= 2.9287109375
x= 3.4630849361419678
x= 3.6779305535505813
x= 3.7240678179159414
x= 3.7309653577225825
x= 3.7309653577225825 f(x)= -0.0037589303643326133
```
